title: Remote Security Assessment
headline: Evaluate and strengthen your setup remotely.
description: We perform a comprehensive remote security audit of your systems, looking for vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, and weak points.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Many systems that look secure still expose open ports, outdated services, or weak default settings that can be exploited without detection.
Password reuse, unpatched software, and browser extensions are some of the most common weak points attackers exploit first.
A remote audit can reveal misconfigurations and blind spots without requiring physical access to your devices or network.

sections.heading: Included in Every Assessment
items: Review of firewall rules, antivirus configuration, and system patch levels
Audit of account settings, password usage, and MFA implementation
Inspection of browser plugins, software risk posture, and telemetry settings
Evaluation of your backup strategy, encryption practices, and disaster readiness
Actionable report with prioritized recommendations based on your goals

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We connect over an encrypted session and guide you through a structured security review. We do not collect your data. Everything is reviewed live, documented clearly, and delivered with practical steps to improve your setup immediately.
